snippet: Hundreds of thousands more Gazans have been displaced than the United Nations thought was possible in an emergency, a Unicef official said.
abstract: Top Unicef official says that United Nations drastically underestimated devastation that could result from possible assaults by Israel on Gaza; 350,000 people have been displaced from six-week-old conflict, seven times predicted 50,000 planned for in contingency plan.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds of thousands more Gazans have been displaced than the United Nations thought was possible in an emergency, a Unicef official said.

headline.main: Gaza Cost Far Exceeds Estimate, Official Says
headline.print_headline: Gaza Cost Far Exceeds Estimate, Official Says
